changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.protocol_attribute ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier protocol bigint NOT NULL, -- The protocol whose attributes are being specified location_value bigint, product_value bigint, agency_value bigint, attribute bigint NOT NULL, -- The Attribute or facet of the given protocol being declared sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL, -- Ordering and uniqueness, for when a protocol can have multiple values for a given Attribute text_value character varying, -- If the Attribute is text-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL numeric_value numeric, -- If the Attribute is numeric-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL boolean_value boolean, integer_value integer, -- If the Attribute is integer-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL timestamp_value timestamp, -- If the Attribute has a timestamp value, it is stored in this column binary_value bytea, -- If the Attribute has a binary value, it is stored in this column unit bigint, -- The unit of measure (if any) associated with the given value notes character varying, -- Additional notes regarding this rule updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The agency that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_protocol_fkey FOREIGN KEY (protocol) REFERENCES ruleform.protocol (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_product_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_value) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_agency_fkey FOREIGN KEY (agency_value) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_location_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location_value) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_units_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_sequence_number_key UNIQUE (protocol , attribute , sequence_number ), CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_sequence_number_check CHECK (sequence_number > 0), CONSTRAINT protocol_attribute_valid_value CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(text_value) + ruleform.null_zero(numeric_value) + ruleform.null_zero(integer_value) + ruleform.null_zero(timestamp_value) + ruleform.null_zero(binary_value) + ruleform.null_zero(location_value) + ruleform.null_zero(agency_value) + ruleform.null_zero(product_value)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.protocol_attribute IS 'Attributes attached to a specific invocation of an Event'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.id IS 'Unique identifier'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.protocol IS 'The protocol whose attributes are being specified'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.attribute IS 'The Attribute or facet of the given protocol being declared'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.sequence_number IS 'Ordering and uniqueness, for when a protocol can have multiple values for a given Attribute'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.text_value IS 'If the Attribute is text-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.numeric_value IS 'If the Attribute is numeric-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.integer_value IS 'If the Attribute is integer-valued, the value goes in this column; all other value columns should be NULL'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.unit IS 'The unit of measure (if any) associated with the given value'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.notes IS 'Additional notes regarding this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.updated_by IS 'The agency that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.protocol_attribute.update_date IS 'The date this rule was last changed';
